name: Kuudere Simulator - Revival
description:
This is a fan made Remake of "Kuudere Simulator", A game developed by YandereDev in 2015. 

Open to Taking Suggestions for Features and Easter Eggs!

EasterEggs:

K - Base Kuudere, the one and only.

Shift + M - Male Kuudere (May have some voice inconsistency)

Shift + Ctrl + S - SANS Kuudere

C - Corona Mask

Controls:

Left Click - Spawn A Senpai where you click

Spacebar - Sans: Spawns Gasterblaster and kills Senpai.

Spacebar - Kuudere: Make your distaste for senpai clear, All Senpais in the area suddenly die of heartbreak.

This is a fan based project, Yandere Simulator, Kuudere Simulator, and their Sound Clips belong to Yandere Dev, The Yandere Simulator Development Team, and the respectful voice actors. Please support the official Release
